alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:17PM MDT until June 21 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southeastern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 816 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Deer Trail, or 29 miles northwest of Limon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Deer Trail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
